title: Blacksnow Cycles EDC MK2 Mini Cargo
content:
The Blacksnow Cycles EDC MK2 mini cargo bike is the byproduct of a year of in-house development from the Taiwanese brand. The EDC Mk2 now has an all-new, in-house developed front stainless steel rack, which has a max load of up to 50 kg. There are now three optional transmission systems, including a Pinion center gearbox, Rohloff rear hub, and a derailleur system, available when you order an EDC. Blacksnow also modified the stand-over height with a curved top tube. Finally, the rear wheel changed from 26″ to 27.5″, with a 2.4″ wide tire for more available market options and more sure-footed handling when the bike has a load.

Blacksnow is distributed by Merry Sales in the United States, so be sure to get your local bike shop to put in a request for one!
